select
from wp_history where id in #{id}

select c.*,a.name,a.sn,a.price,a.marketPrice,a.isMarketable, CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'),CONCAT(CONCAT(groupName,'/'),d.url)) AS image from wp_history c LEFT JOIN wp_goods a ON c.goodsId = a.id LEFT JOIN wp_goods_images d ON d.goodsId = a.id ${condition}

select c.*,a.name,a.sn,a.price,a.marketPrice, CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'),CONCAT(CONCAT(groupName,'/'),d.url)) AS image from wp_history c LEFT JOIN wp_goods a ON c.goodsId = a.id LEFT JOIN wp_goods_images d ON d.goodsId = a.id ${condition}
select count(id) as result from wp_history where tenantId = #{tenantId}

select c.*,a.name,a.sn,a.price,a.marketPrice, CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'),CONCAT(CONCAT(groupName,'/'),d.url)) AS image from wp_history c LEFT JOIN wp_goods a ON c.goodsId = a.id LEFT JOIN wp_goods_images d ON d.goodsId = a.id where c.memberId = #{memberId} GROUP BY d.goodsId order by c.createDate desc limit 0,6

SELECT h.goodsId, count(1) c, g.id, g.`name`, g.fullName, g.categoryId, g.categoryPath, g.price, (select CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'), CONCAT(CONCAT(i.groupName,'/'),i.url)) from wp_goods_images i where i.goodsId = h.goodsId ORDER BY i.createDate limit 1) pic FROM wp_history h LEFT JOIN wp_goods g ON g.id = h.goodsId WHERE g.isMarketable = 1 AND g.status = 5 AND g.platform <= 2 AND concat(',',g.categoryPath,',') LIKE concat(',',#{categoryPath}, '') GROUP BY h.goodsId ORDER BY c DESC limit 3
